shows.name: Mughal-e-Azam: The Musical
shows.description: Grand musical adaptation of the classic Bollywood film featuring spectacular sets, costumes, and live orchestra.

shows.name: Anubhav Singh Bassi - 'Kisi Ko Batana Mat'
shows.description: Hilarious stand-up comedy show by Anubhav Singh Bassi, where he narrates his life experiences with a comedic twist.

shows.description: Classical Indian theater presentation of the Ramayana with traditional music, dance, and elaborate costumes.

shows.name: Zakir Khan Live
shows.description: Popular stand-up comedian Zakir Khan performs his latest material with his signature storytelling style.

shows.name: Bharatanatyam Recital by Leela Samson
shows.description: A traditional Bharatanatyam performance by the renowned dancer Leela Samson, showcasing the purity of the Kalakshetra style.

shows.name: Hindustani Classical Concert
shows.description: Evening of Hindustani classical music featuring renowned vocalists and instrumentalists in an intimate setting.

shows.name: Bollywood Dance Musical
shows.description: High-energy Bollywood musical featuring hit songs, choreographed dance sequences, and colorful costumes.

shows.name: Kathak Performance by Shovana Narayan
shows.description: Mesmerizing Kathak dance performance by Padma Shri awardee Shovana Narayan, showcasing the grace of the Lucknow gharana.

shows.description: A spiritual evening of Sufi music and qawwali with the legendary Wadali Brothers in the historic setting of Purana Qila.

shows.name: Koodiyattam Performance
shows.description: UNESCO-recognized traditional Sanskrit theater form of Kerala with elaborate makeup, costumes, and expressions.

shows.name: Biswa Kalyan Rath Live
shows.description: Intellectual comedy by Biswa Kalyan Rath with his unique observational humor and witty commentary on everything.

shows.name: Odissi Dance Recital
shows.description: Graceful Odissi dance performance showcasing the classical dance form of Odisha with temple sculptures come to life.

shows.description: Vibrant Punjabi folk performance featuring bhangra, giddha, and traditional music celebrating Punjab's rich culture.

shows.name: Manipuri Dance Drama
shows.description: Ethereal Manipuri dance drama depicting stories from Krishna's life with delicate movements and colorful costumes.

shows.name: Kuchipudi Ballet
shows.description: Grand Kuchipudi ballet presentation combining classical dance with dramatic storytelling and live music.

shows.name: Gujarati Play - 'Kanjee Viruddh Kanjee'
shows.description: A thought-provoking Gujarati play that inspired the movie 'OMG â€“ Oh My God!', performed by a veteran cast.

shows.description: The legendary Marathi musical theater (Sangeet Natak) that showcases a battle between two musical gharanas.

shows.name: Bengali Drama - 'Raja Lear'
shows.description: An adaptation of Shakespeare's 'King Lear' in Bengali, directed by and starring thespian Soumitra Chatterjee.

shows.description: A spectacular five-day music festival showcasing Rajasthani and international folk artists in the royal setting of Mehrangarh Fort.

shows.name: Carnatic Music Concert - 'Margazhi Mahotsavam'
shows.description: A quintessential Carnatic music concert part of the Chennai December Music Season, featuring renowned vocalists.

shows.name: Assamese Bihu Performance
shows.description: A vibrant and energetic Bihu dance performance celebrating the Assamese new year with traditional music and attire.

shows.name: Kannada Play - 'Tughlaq'
shows.description: Girish Karnad's timeless classic 'Tughlaq', a powerful Kannada play exploring the paradoxes of the sultan's character.

shows.name: Mohiniyattam Recital
shows.description: Graceful Mohiniyattam performance showcasing the feminine classical dance form of Kerala with flowing movements.

shows.name: Jashn-e-Rekhta
shows.description: A three-day festival celebrating the spirit of Urdu language, literature, and culture through ghazals, qawwalis, poetry, and discussions.

shows.name: Yakshagana Performance
shows.description: Traditional Yakshagana theater from coastal Karnataka featuring elaborate costumes, makeup, and mythological stories.

shows.name: Arijit Singh Live in Concert
shows.description: Experience the magic of Arijit Singh's soulful voice in a grand live concert.

shows.name: Kenny Sebastian - 'Professor of Tomfoolery'
shows.description: Join Kenny Sebastian for a night of laughter as he combines his musical and comedic talents.

shows.name: Theyyam Festival
shows.description: Witness the ancient and vibrant ritualistic dance of Theyyam, where performers embody deities.

shows.name: Prateek Kuhad 'The Way That Lovers Do' Tour
shows.description: Catch singer-songwriter Prateek Kuhad live on his India tour, performing his beloved hits.

shows.name: Ismat Apa Ke Naam - A Play by Naseeruddin Shah
shows.description: A celebrated theatre performance featuring stories by Ismat Chughtai, directed by and starring Naseeruddin Shah.

shows.name: Rann Utsav
shows.description: Experience the carnival of music, dance, and natural beauty at the white desert of Kutch.

shows.name: Sunburn Festival Goa
shows.description: Asia's largest electronic dance music festival featuring top international and Indian DJs.

shows.name: Sattriya Dance Performance
shows.description: Experience the devotional and graceful Sattriya dance, a classical form originating from the monasteries of Majuli island.

shows.name: Indian Ocean - Live in Concert
shows.description: The pioneers of fusion rock in India, Indian Ocean, perform their classic hits and new compositions.

shows.name: Abhishek Upmanyu - 'Jealous of Sabziwala'
shows.description: Abhishek Upmanyu is back with his new special, delivering his unique brand of observational and anecdotal humor.

shows.name: Chhau Dance of Purulia
shows.description: A vibrant and acrobatic martial dance form from Purulia, performed with elaborate masks and costumes.

shows.name: Storytelling by Neelesh Misra
shows.description: An intimate evening with India's most loved storyteller, Neelesh Misra, and his 'Yaadon Ka IdiotBox'.

shows.name: Hornbill Festival
shows.description: The 'Festival of Festivals' showcasing the rich culture and traditions of the Naga tribes.

shows.name: P. C. Sorcar's Magic Show
shows.description: Experience the world-famous illusions and grand magic of the legendary P. C. Sorcar family.

shows.name: Ghazal Evening with Hariharan
shows.description: A mesmerizing evening of soulful ghazals performed by the maestro, Hariharan.

shows.name: Shillong Chamber Choir
shows.venue: Sir Mutha Venkatasubba Rao Concert Hall
shows.description: The award-winning Shillong Chamber Choir presents a captivating performance of western classical, pop, and Khasi folk music.

shows.name: Vir Das - 'Mind Fool' Tour
shows.description: India's global comedian Vir Das brings his brand new 'Mind Fool' tour to his home country.

shows.name: Langa and Manganiyar Folk Jam
shows.description: An electrifying jam session featuring the hereditary folk musicians of Rajasthan - the Langas and Manganiyars.

shows.name: Theatre - 'Maa In Transit'
shows.description: A powerful play in English and Hindi about a daughter's relationship with her mother, starring the acclaimed actor Makarand Deshpande.

shows.name: Kailash Kher & Kailasa Live
shows.description: Experience the high-energy, soulful performance of Kailash Kher with his band Kailasa.

shows.name: Lavani Mahotsav
shows.description: A festival celebrating the traditional Maharashtrian dance form of Lavani, known for its powerful rhythm and expressive storytelling.

shows.name: Shreya Ghoshal Live
shows.description: The melody queen Shreya Ghoshal enchants her hometown with a concert filled with her greatest hits.

shows.name: Kumbh Mela Experience
shows.description: The largest peaceful gathering in the world, a Hindu pilgrimage of faith, devotion, and cultural spectacle.

shows.name: Aditi Mittal - 'Mother of Invention'
shows.description: One of India's first female stand-up comedians, Aditi Mittal, brings her bold and unapologetic humor to the stage.

shows.name: NH7 Weekender
shows.description: India's happiest music festival, featuring a diverse lineup of Indian and international artists across multiple genres.

shows.name: Therukoothu: Street Theatre of Tamil Nadu
shows.description: A traditional street theatre performance of Tamil Nadu, bringing epic tales to life with music, dance, and vibrant makeup.

shows.name: Bihu Workshop and Performance
shows.description: Learn the joyful steps of Bihu dance from Assamese artists, followed by a vibrant performance.

shows.name: Rahul Subramanian - 'Kal Main Udega'
shows.description: Rahul Subramanian's hilarious take on random, everyday topics will leave you in splits.

shows.name: Pushkar Camel Fair
shows.description: One of India's most iconic festivals, a vibrant mix of a camel and livestock fair, cultural performances, and religious pilgrimage.

shows.name: Sunidhi Chauhan - 'My Musical Story'
shows.description: The powerhouse performer Sunidhi Chauhan takes you on a musical journey through her chart-topping hits.

shows.name: Ganga Aarti Ceremony
shows.description: A divine and mesmerizing evening ritual on the banks of the Ganges, with lamps, incense, and chants.

shows.name: Mahindra Blues Festival
shows.description: Asia's largest Blues festival, featuring legendary international and Indian blues artists.

shows.name: Ritviz - 'Baaraat' Concert
shows.description: Dance to the unique blend of Indian classical and electronic music by the sensational artist Ritviz.

shows.name: Kalaripayattu Demonstration
shows.description: An awe-inspiring demonstration of one of the oldest martial arts in the world, Kalaripayattu, featuring weapon and hand-to-hand combat.

shows.name: Jaipur Literature Festival
shows.description: The 'greatest literary show on Earth', a confluence of the world's greatest writers, thinkers, and humanitarians.

shows.name: Baul Gaan of Bengal
shows.description: Experience the mystic minstrelsy of the Bauls of Bengal, a folk tradition of spiritual and musical seekers.

shows.name: Nishant Suri Live
shows.description: The winner of Comicstaan Season 1, Nishant Suri, brings his angry and relatable rants to the stage.

shows.name: Gidda and Bhangra Night
shows.description: An evening dedicated to the high-energy folk dances of Punjab, Gidda (by women) and Bhangra (by men).

shows.name: Aakash Gupta - 'Excuse Me Brother'
shows.description: Join Aakash Gupta for a laughter riot as he hilariously enacts his observations of everyday Indian life.

shows.name: Holi at Barsana (Lathmar Holi)
shows.description: A unique and playful celebration of Holi where women of Barsana playfully hit men with sticks (lathis).

shows.name: Pandavani - Folk Ballad of Mahabharata
shows.description: A powerful folk singing style narrating tales from the Mahabharata, performed by the legendary artist Teejan Bai.

shows.name: Gaurav Kapoor Live
shows.description: Gaurav Kapoor brings his hilarious stories and sharp observations from a middle-class perspective.

shows.name: Mysuru Dasara Procession (Jamboo Savari)
shows.description: The grand finale of the 10-day Dasara festival, a spectacular procession of decorated elephants, floats, and performers.

shows.name: Sanjeeta Bhattacharya - Live
shows.description: An intimate gig with Delhi-based singer-songwriter Sanjeeta Bhattacharya, known for her blend of jazz, R&B, and Latin styles.

shows.name: Agnee Live - A Rock Concert
shows.description: The popular Indian rock band 'Agnee' performs their hit tracks and folk-rock anthems.

shows.name: Durga Puja Pandal Hopping
shows.description: Experience the grandeur of Kolkata's biggest festival by visiting thematic and artistic pandals across the city.

shows.name: Gotipua Dance of Odisha
shows.description: The precursor to Odissi, Gotipua is a traditional dance where young boys dress as girls to praise Lord Jagannath.

shows.name: K-Pop India Convention
shows.description: The biggest gathering of K-Pop fans in India, featuring dance competitions, fan-meets, and merchandise stalls.

shows.name: Bade Miyan Deorare - A Dastangoi Performance
shows.description: Experience the lost art of Urdu storytelling, Dastangoi, with a captivating performance by Mahmood Farooqui and Darain Shahidi.

shows.name: Samay Raina's Unfiltered Stand-up
shows.description: Comedian and chess master Samay Raina performs his latest stand-up material with his signature unhinged energy.

shows.name: Makarand Gupte's Puppet Show
shows.description: A delightful and meaningful puppet show for all ages by the master puppeteer Makarand Gupte, telling stories from the Panchatantra.

shows.name: Parikrama - 30 Years of Rock
shows.description: One of India's oldest and most iconic rock bands, Parikrama, celebrates 30 years with a power-packed concert.

shows.name: Tholu Bommalata - Shadow Puppetry
shows.description: Experience the ancient art of leather shadow puppetry from Andhra Pradesh, depicting stories from the Ramayana and Mahabharata.

shows.name: Comic Con India
shows.description: The ultimate celebration of pop culture! Experience comics, movies, gaming, cosplay, and meet your favorite artists.

shows.name: Harsh Gujral Live
shows.description: Kanpur's own Harsh Gujral tells funny stories about his life and interacts with the audience like a pro.

shows.name: Bhand Pather of Kashmir
shows.description: A traditional satirical and mimetic theatre form of Kashmir, combining dance, music, and clowning to comment on social issues.

shows.name: Mame Khan's Desert Soul
shows.description: Internationally acclaimed folk singer Mame Khan presents the soulful and vibrant music of Rajasthan.

shows.name: International Kite Festival (Uttarayan)
shows.description: The skies of Ahmedabad come alive with millions of kites, as part of the vibrant Uttarayan celebration.
cast: Kite Flyers from around the world

shows.name: The Local Train - Live
shows.description: One of India's most popular Hindi rock bands, The Local Train, performs their hit anthems.

shows.name: Nautanki - Folk Theatre of UP
shows.description: Experience the operatic and humorous folk theatre of Uttar Pradesh, Nautanki, filled with song, dance, and drama.

shows.name: Anoushka Shankar Live
shows.description: Grammy-nominated sitar virtuoso Anoushka Shankar presents a mesmerizing concert blending classical Indian music with global sounds.

shows.name: Ganesh Chaturthi Immersion
shows.description: Witness the grand spectacle of Ganesh Visarjan, where massive idols are immersed in the sea amidst music and dance.

shows.name: Kanan Gill - 'Is This It?'
shows.description: Comedian Kanan Gill gets existential and hilarious in his brand new stand-up special.

shows.name: Haryanvi Folk Night - 'Ragini'
shows.description: An evening of traditional Haryanvi folk music and storytelling, featuring the popular art form of Ragini.

shows.name: Ustad Amjad Ali Khan - Sarod Recital
shows.description: A magical evening with the Sarod maestro Ustad Amjad Ali Khan, accompanied by his sons Amaan and Ayaan Ali Bangash.

shows.name: Thespo - National Youth Theatre Festival
shows.description: A festival celebrating the best of youth theatre from across India, featuring plays, workshops, and platform performances.

shows.name: Sikkimese Folk Dance Show
shows.description: A colorful display of Sikkimese culture through its traditional folk dances like the Maruni and Tamang Selo.

shows.name: Thiruvathira Kali Performance
shows.description: A graceful group dance performed by women during the festival of Thiruvathira, celebrating marital fidelity and the love of Parvati for Shiva.

shows.name: When Chai Met Toast - Live
shows.description: The happy indie-folk band from Kochi brings their infectious energy and joyful music to Bengaluru.

shows.name: International Mango Festival
shows.description: A celebration of the king of fruits, featuring hundreds of varieties of mangoes, mango-eating competitions, and cultural shows.

shows.name: Ziro Festival of Music
shows.description: India's greatest outdoor music festival, set in the stunning Ziro Valley, featuring a lineup of indie artists from around the world.

shows.name: Dandia Raas Night
shows.description: Celebrate Navratri with a night of energetic Dandiya and Garba, dancing to live folk and Bollywood music.

shows.name: Nukkad Natak (Street Play) Competition
shows.description: A competition featuring college and professional theatre groups presenting powerful street plays on social issues.

shows.name: Spoken Word Poetry Slam
shows.description: An evening of powerful emotions and compelling stories at a competitive poetry slam event.

shows.name: Sounds of the Valley - Kashmiri Music Concert
shows.description: A concert dedicated to the rich musical heritage of Kashmir, featuring Sufiyana Kalam, Chakri, and contemporary artists.
shows.director: JK Academy of Art, Culture and Languages
